posts.caption: security.stackexchange.com
posts.description: In the UK, the company TalkTalk was recently hacked. It was later discovered, after 'investigation' that the hack was not as serious as it could have been (and less than expected). I'm wondering...

posts.message:
If anyone has a problem with tabs opening in atom editor by one click; just do the following : 

Settings
Packages
Installed Packages
Search for 'tabs' - it's a core package
In its settings check 'Use preview tabs'

#atom
